identity.titles: Prince of the Déos, Leader of the Resistance

appearance.description: Elder brother of the twins. A mature and battle-hardened prince who has spent years building a resistance movement.

combat.specialization: Mastered pure ether manipulation, teleportation, combat magic

personality.temperament: Determined, charismatic, carries heavy burden of responsibility
personality.values: Duty to the Déos people, family reunion, justice
personality.motivations: Reunite the Déos people and rescue their captured father
personality.fears: Failing his people, losing more family

connections.family: Darian (father, captured), Lysandra (mother, deceased), Aeron & Aeria (younger twin siblings)
connections.organizations: Founder and leader of the Déos resistance organization

narrative.storyArc: Bridge between twins' past and future, resistance leader
narrative.futureDevelopment: Reveals the twins' heritage, offers them a path
